fullDescription.intro:
Displays a local BAM file using the Picard API. Not, this node still needs to be refreshed after each KNIME session. The first table contains the VCF results. The second table contains the sample name and the path to a BAM file.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
This nodes uses the Picard Library to read the BAMs.
